entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Bernières
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:56 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sainte-Foy - Laval University 06:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023
Temperature: -2.4°C
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: -2.4°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except 80 near the river. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late this evening then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023
